events.title: Music Theory & Bass Guitar
events.description: A session blending music theory with bass guitar, combining knowledge and pure musical vibe. Learn, jam, and feel the groove.

events.title: Cultural Quiz
events.description: A fun cultural quiz happening across multiple club session venues. Test your cultural IQ and win bragging rights.

events.title: Phone Photography & Videography Workshop
events.description: A hands-on workshop to level up phone photography and videography skills, from cool shots to cinematic videos.

events.title: Short Film Screening
events.description: A screening night featuring powerful short films that tell impactful stories in minutes.

events.title: Public Speaking
events.description: A special session focused on expressing thoughts with confidence, clarity, and impact. No prior experience required.

events.title: Open Mic Night
events.description: An energetic open mic night featuring singers, poets, comedians, storytellers, and hidden talents. A late-night celebration as part of the ART Festival.

events.title: Tattoo Making Session
events.description: An expressive tattoo-making session where art meets skin. Create, experiment, and ink your story.

events.title: Caricature Space
events.description: A fun and lively caricature space where artists turn your features and personality into playful cartoon portraits. Drop by, pose, and walk away with a smile and a unique sketch.
